item.title: WiscKey 论文阅读笔记
item.description: WiscKey 论文阅读笔记 WiscKey: Separating Keys from Values in SSD-conscious Storage 1. 资源 论文： Lanyue Lu, Thanumalayan Sankaranarayana Pillai, Andrea C. Arpaci-Dusseau, and Remzi H. Arpaci-Dusseau. 2016. WiscKey: Separating keys from values in SSD-conscious storage. In Proceedings of the 14th USENIX Conference on File and Storage Technologies (FAST’16). https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3033273 Lanyue Lu, Thanumalayan Sankaranarayana Pillai, Hariharan Gopalakrishnan, Andrea C. Arpaci- Dusseau, and Remzi H. Arpaci-Dusseau. 2017. WiscKey: Separating keys from values in SSD-conscious storage.
